frontmatter.title: Exploring Project Firefly - CI/CD
frontmatter.description: Manik Jindal, Firefly Product Manager, will dive into CI/CD. You'll learn how to set up Github CI/CD we include with Project Firefly. In addition, we'll cover how to setup  a custom CI/CD pipeline with your tool of choice. Bring your questions and the Firefly team will be happy to answer any and all after the presentation.
